name: Momentum Capital B.V.
membership: Slum World Foundation (Stichting Home Work Foundation) http://www.homework-foundation.org/?page_id=49
goal:
Momentum Capital?s vision
The world population, urbanization and global living standards are all growing dramatically. This cannot be sustainable without ?future-proofing? the continuing changes. Since Momentum Capital?s start, we haved recognized sustainability as one of the key values in our investments.

Momentum Capital?s focus is on businesses in growth markets answering to a specific social need, with sustainability as the key starting point.

Momentum Capital is active in two sectors:

Urban Development
Brazil and Poland are characterized by increasing industrial development, expansion of urban zones, growing populations and rising welfare in the middle class. I

Clean Technology
The world population and standards of living worldwide are increasing dramatically. This also means increased consumption of the available natural resources. Momentum Capital focuses on clean technology, through its focus on businesses developing and using sustainable, groundbreaking technologies.

Activities will concern the areas of Private Equity (with a focus on Renewable Energy), Clean Technology and Urban Development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment
